entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rouyn-Noranda
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -17.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rouyn Airport 1:14 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -17.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -21.4°C
Wind: S 28 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
